vote.title: Authorize acquisition of a wastewater easement from Farmers and Merchant Bank and R.K.C.J., LLC of approximately 41,604 square feet of land located near the intersection of University Hill Boulevard and Camp Wisdom Road for the University Hills Infrastructure Project - Not to exceed $9,941.00 ($7,641.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $2,300.00) - Financing: Street and Alley Improvement Fund
